title: (x) Empire Magazine nameplate - (based on) Relay {Stephen}
content:
Hi,

Can anyone tell me the what the typeface of the Empire Magazine Masthead is?  
(See attached image)

Thanks in advance,

Linda

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [empirejokerlarge.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032608/http:/typophile.com/files/empirejokerlarge.jpg) | 200.5 KB |

 [‹ (x) MP Patriot school logo - Wolf's Bane {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032608/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42749 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Palladium, NYC logo Art Deco display sans - Boul Mich {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032608/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42721 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wanglin

comments.content: The sans face that they use (rather sloppily) elsewhere on the cover is [Relay](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032608/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Relay). So maybe it’s a modification of that.

following on from this, does anyone know the typeface empire use for their columns and page footer?

thanks  
john
Have you got scans of that?
Why am I disturbed by this?
